#2D983DFishing.esmIanThe fishing poles you find in the game are now usable fishing poles. Get near the water outside or in a cave and cast your line by swinging it as you would a weapon. Craft bait with a Bait Bucket. #66515ATradehouseBasement.ESPTizzoArrille has refurbished the basement room of his Tradehouse in Seyda Neen. Look for a rental notice near Arrille, and present it to him to be offered a chance to rent the room. Includes various scripted amenties. See ReadMe.txt for details. #575832Westly Presents_Night Song Armour.espWestlyThis plugin adds armour inspired by Spellforce 2 to TESIII: Morrowind. The armour can be found in a special chest in the Guild of Fighters in Vivec.
